sentence.Network_en: It taught only materialism, the gospel of mammon.
sentence.Network_cn: 它只是宣扬金钱至上的物欲主义。

sentence.Network_en: Society's march toward ever-increasing materialism was continuing.
sentence.Network_cn: 社会继续向日益高涨的物质享乐主义方向发展。
唯心论和唯物论是对立的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: M开头的英语四级词汇_百度文库 ... material n. 材料；素材a.物质的 materialism n. 唯物主义 mathematical a. 数学的，数学上的.

在物质主义(materialism)和自然主义(naturalism)的立场而言，即使有一天，因无法想象的大变迁到来而令全世界的生命消失，只要物 …

list.abs: ...；对于没有信息电子化的公司，也要把这些数据统计得清清楚楚，一个账目混乱的企业是不会有好的经济效益的。, 3.材料(material), 第二个M就是材料(material)采购部要对每一种原材料都应严格按照公司质检部门规定的质量标准把好.

entry.def: Materialism is the attitude of someone who attaches a lot of importance to money and wants to possess a lot of material things.

example.ex: ...the rising consumer materialism in society at large.
example.tran: 全社会范围内日渐蔓延的消费至上意识

entry.def: Materialism is the belief that only physical matter exists, and that there is no spiritual world.

means.word_mean: 1. a desire for wealth and material possessions with little interest in ethical or spiritual matters
2. (philosophy) the philosophical theory that matter is the only reality

auth_sentence.content: In this world we have two types of materialism.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this world we have two types of materialism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this world we have two types of materialism.

auth_sentence.content: This religion of materialism filled me with misgiving.
auth_sentence.res_content: This religion of materialism filled me with misgiving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This religion of materialism filled me with misgiving.

auth_sentence.content: We have traded violence for materialism and self-gratification.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have traded violence for materialism and self-gratification.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have traded violence for materialism and self-gratification.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具备某种性质"; 2. 表示"学术或学术流派,行业"; 3. 表示"行为,现象,状态"; 4. 表示"疾病"; 5. 名词,表示"各种主义,宗教"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurb荒唐的+ism具备某种性质→n.荒诞主义
ant=anti反对,对抗+agon斗争+ism具备某种性质→n.对抗,敌对

human人+ism具备某种性质→n.人道主义

fatal命运注定的+ism学术或学术流派→n.宿命论

modern现代的+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.现代主义,现代派

means.word_mean: 唯物主义;唯物论;实利主义;物质主义

sentences.en: In the west some people think that ours is an age marked by a strong movement toward materialism.
sentences.cn: 西方有些人认为我们时代的一个特点是具有强烈的实利主义趋向。
